DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study evaluate superiority regard vitreomacular adhesion ( VMA ) resolution single intravitreal injection A01016 ( Ocriplasmin ) compare sham-injection subject symptomatic VMA .
DOC.brief_title: A Phase III Study A01016 Subjects With Symptomatic Vitreomacular Adhesion
DOC.criteria: Symptomatic vitreomacular adhesion ( VMA ) , opinion Investigator , relate decreased visual function ; Best correct visual acuity ( BCVA ) 20/25 bad study eye ; BCVA 20/800 good nonstudy eye ; Provide write informed consent ; Follow specify instruction study period ; Other protocoldefined inclusion criterion may apply . Evidence proliferative retinopathy , exudative agerelated macular degeneration , retinal vein occlusion study eye ; Vitreous hemorrhage opacification ; High myopia study eye ; Ocular surgery , laser photocoagulation treatment , intravitreal injection ( ) study eye prior 3 month ; Uncontrolled glaucoma study eye ; History retinal detachment either eye ; Active infection either eye ; Pregnant childbearing potential utilizing acceptable form contraception ; Participation another investigational drug study within 30 day prior study ; Other protocoldefined exclusion criterion may apply .
